page.title: 18SOCIETIES IN HOLYMOORSIDE
page.content: There are many societies in the village. The village has a very good {Choral Society}which performs many concerts. The{Village Band}is very good. It is tradition for the band to tour the village on Christmas Day playing carols. The{Village Horticultural Society holds an annual Rose and Sweet Pea Show. The villagers bring their prize exhibits to be shown in the Village Hall. The Village Hall provides a good base for many groups and societies. The{Women's Institute, Mother and Baby {Club and the Good Companions}all meet during the week. The village has a {youth club}as well as{Scouts, Guides, {Cubs and Brownie}organisations. These generally meet in the school buildings.
